body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Car Masters customer service. My name is Justin Thompson. May I know your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Danielle. Can you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five four two three one zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Danielle. Is there anything specific I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling frustrated about a recent service experience at one of your dealerships.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Danielle. Thank you for sharing your feedback. We will look into this matter. Thank you for your time today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Justin. I appreciate your help. Goodbye.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye, Danielle. Have a great day!
